Gray Pillar Kantarubis:
Mica - jellylike substance in which materialized vital energy. It found only on this side of the world.
Depending on the circumstances it can be the source of life, to serve food or to exchange for goods like money. Amazing, isn't it?
Before it was to be mined in large quantities in the habitats of fairies, but after all these disasters to get the Mica was not easy.
